publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3119 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Railway Crimeâ€”That the Parliament recognises the unacceptable levels of trespass, vandalism, injury and theft on the Scottish rail network; calls on parents, educators and relevant public agencies to take a proactive stance in warning children of potential dangers on the railways; supports the efforts of Network Rail through its approach of education, engineering and enforcement, and notes the huge financial cost, delays and disruption caused by railway crime and the potentially large safety risks posed by such activity. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, Margaret Mitchell*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-3119 Railway Crime (lodged on 21 July 2005) Mr John Swinney*, Shiona Baird*, Mike Rumbles*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-3119 Railway Crime (lodged on 21 July 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Iain Smith*, Mr Jim Wallace*
S2M-3119 Railway Crime (lodged on 21 July 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3119 Railway Crime (lodged on 21 July 2005) Trish Godman*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3119 Railway Crime (lodged on 21 July 2005) Elaine Smith*
